title: Food Theory: M&Ms Melt In Your Hand, LIE To Your Face!
author: The Food Theorists
description:
Special thanks to Noom for sponsoring this episode!
Take your FREE 30 second quiz & get started today! ► https://noom.com/foodtheory 

Help me host Jeopardy & sign the petition! ► https://www.change.org/p/jeopardy-make-matpat-the-next-jeopardy-host

You’ve probably heard the classic M&M slogan that the candy “Melts in your mouth, not your hands!” Is that TRUE? Theorists, I want to find the definitive answer. We are putting this candy coated chocolate treat to the test to find out if M&Ms have been LYING to us the whole time! 

SUBSCRIBE for Every Theory! ►► https://bit.ly/2CdCooV

localize.title: 食べ物の理論。M&Mは手の中で溶けて、顔には嘘をつく！？
